titleStmt.title: Observations upon experimental philosophy to which is added The description of a new blazing world / written by the thrice noble, illustrious, and excellent princesse, the Duchess of Newcastle.
titleStmt.author: Newcastle, Margaret Cavendish, Duchess of, 1624?-1674.

notesStmt.note: "The description of a new world called the blazing new world" has separate t.p.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
